name: Bokun Box: Jammed
description:
Story
Bokun box is a Puzzle platformer about a box that is lost in a cave; he is not alone though, he soon meets another that is also lost and the 2 must work together to find the way out.

Music is by bebeeee - itch.io page - https://bebeeee.itch.io/free-music-pack

note: the game has multiple known issues but there was no time to fix them, enjoy the game!

Devlog coming soon
